Related Character(s): 毸
Связанный символ (и): 毸

毰字的基本解释

毰
péi
〔毰毢（
s乮 ）〕ａ．鸟羽张开，如“翅重飞不得，毰毰上林表。”ｂ．飞舞，如“池上野鹤无数好，晴天镜里雪毰毰。”均亦作“毰毸”。

毰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péi］
［《廣韻》薄回切，平灰，並。］
见“毰毸”。

毰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毰； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页594第11
【廣韻】薄回切【集韻】蒲枚切，?音裴。毰毸，張羽貌。一曰鳳舞也。【韓愈·雪詩】興與酒毰毸。【王安石·鵞詩】晴天鏡裏雪毰毸。　【集韻】或作?。

毰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毰字的起名意思

暂无。

毰
Basic explanation of words
毰
péi
〔毰毢(
s 乮)] a. Toba spreads out, such as "Wings are too heavy to fly, so you can go up to the forest table." b. Flying and dancing, such as "There are countless wild cranes in the pond, and there are snow in the mirror on a sunny day." Both are also called "毰毸".
毰

[①]［péi］
["Guangyun" thin back cut, flat gray, combined. ]
See "毰毸".
毰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毰; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 594 No. 11
[Guang Yun] Thin back cut [Ji Yun] Pu Mei cut,? Yin Pei.毰毸, Zhang Yumei. One said the phoenix dance. [Han Yu·Xue Poem] Xing and Jiu 毰毸. [Wang Anshi·Early Poems] There is snow in the mirror on a sunny day.　【Jiyun】or make?.
